Type Alias# IntentParameter.InclusiveRange

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
typealias InclusiveRange<Bound> = (lowerBound: Bound, upperBound: Bound) where Bound : Comparable
```

Available when `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue` and `Sendable`.## [See Also](/documentation/appintents/intentparameter/inclusiverange-swift.typealias#see-also)
